name: San Francisco Suicide Prevention
description: San Francisco Suicide Prevention provides 24/7 confidential emotional support and crisis intervention through their hotline, operated by Felton Institute.
fullDescription: San Francisco Suicide Prevention provides 24/7 confidential emotional support and crisis intervention through their hotline, operated by Felton Institute.
whatTheyOffer:
- 24/7 crisis phone support
- Compassionate, judgment-free listening
- Crisis intervention and de-escalation
- Referrals to local mental health resources
- Support for anyone in emotional distress
howToGetIt: Call 415-781-0500 anytime, day or night. Free and confidential. No appointment needed.
keywords: San Francisco Suicide Prevention, Felton Institute, crisis hotline, suicide, emotional distress, SF crisis, mental health
